price: 一体、これ（懲罰）は魔術なのか？それとも、あなた方には見えないのか？
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
